constituent: rumor, say, words, keitai, mouth, devil, horns, elder brother, teenager, mouth, human legs
heisigStory: Not inappropriately, this character likens an explanation to the devil's own words.
koohiiStory1: The words of a horny teenager typically fall into one of two categories: either rumors or explanations.
koohiiStory2: The words of the devil incite rumours and false explanations.
myStory: ý kiến. diễn giải. trình bày. anh trai có sừng nói
readingExamples: 説明 (せつめい), 小説 (しょうせつ), 演説 (えんぜつ), 説く (と.く)
words: to explain, to advocate, to preach, to persuade
